org.gradle.api.plugins
Class JavaPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
Plugin
class JavaPlugin

A Plugin which compiles and tests Java source, and assembles it into a JAR file.

author:
Hans Dockter
